creator: t.schoellhorn@wissenswerk.com
text:
Hi, 

to be honest I don't believe this is the right place to make new requirements. 
What I wanted to ask if there is an integration for the KAWA IDE 5.0 for Ant. 
By the way - where is the right place to put ideas to you guys?

Tino

creator: conor@apache.org
text: Just use a severity of enhancement for ideas
*** Bug 8065 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: sbailliez@apache.org
sbailliez@apache.org
text:
Obviouslly it is Kawa's job to integrate with Ant. Not Ant's.

But that's unlikely to happen since this product is discontinued as effective 
since October 31, 2001

http://www.macromedia.com/software/kawa/

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
Tino,

the right place to submit ideas is eithere here (as an enhancement request) or
the ant-dev mailing list.

Ant developers don't provide any IDE integrartion themselves - except for the VAJ
code which is unmaintained as well.  We rely on people actuatlly using an IDE to
add the support themselves.
